name: Leggings of needless powers
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users dexterity pathetically.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users physical resistance strongly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
